Area 53 – Armory enters tapped.
When Area 53 – Armory enters, create a copy of Tools of the Trade. You may cast the copy. [i](It’s a {3}{R} Equipment artifact with “When Tools of the Trade enters, attach it to target creature you control.” and “Equipped creature gets +3/+3.” and “Equip {3}{R}”)[/i]
{T}: Add {R}.
